resources.string: Please ensure Bluetooth pairing has been completed prior. The Bluetooth pairing code is: 4545."

Pair your Android device to PIXEL which will show up as 'PIXEL' in Bluetooth using code 4545.

Photos taken within this app will display on PIXEL.

Close-up photos with solid backgrounds will produce the best results.

Note the last photo will remain displayed on PIXEL even after your Android device is switched off.
Shortcut to the Bluetooth settings screen. Pair to PIXEL using code: 4545
Forces the app to be always on, your device will not go into power savings mode while this app is running. Good if using as a Kiosk for example.
Displays debug messages, use to see how often the Bluetooth connections are getting disconnected and connected as well as other debug messages
